dashboard.tagline: Explore AI-powered tools to accelerate your research journey
dashboard.topics_desc: Discover trending research topics and track their evolution
dashboard.papers_desc: Upload and analyze research papers with AI-powered insights
dashboard.plagiarism_desc: Ensure originality with advanced plagiarism detection
dashboard.journals_desc: Get personalized journal recommendations for your research
dashboard.government_desc: Align research with government priorities and SDG goals
dashboard.impact_desc: Predict the real-world impact of your research

stats.active_projects_hint: Start by uploading a research paper

getting_started.title: Getting Started
getting_started.description: Follow these steps to make the most of Smart Research Hub
getting_started.step1_desc: Start by uploading a paper for AI-powered analysis
getting_started.step4_desc: Understand the potential impact of your work

topics.title: Topic Discovery
topics.description: Discover trending research topics and emerging areas in your field
topics.empty_message: Click the button above to discover trending research topics

papers.title: Paper Analysis
papers.description: Upload and analyze research papers with AI-powered insights
papers.upload_description: Upload PDF files for AI-powered analysis and insights
papers.empty_message: Upload your first research paper to get started

plagiarism.title: Plagiarism Check
plagiarism.description: Ensure originality with advanced AI-powered plagiarism detection
plagiarism.check_description: Paste your abstract or research text below to check for plagiarism and get an originality score
plagiarism.text_placeholder: Paste your research abstract or text here (minimum 100 characters)...
plagiarism.similar_sources_desc: Sources where similar content was found
plagiarism.flagged_sections_desc: Text segments that match existing sources
plagiarism.common_terms_desc: These terms are commonly used in academic literature and don't necessarily indicate plagiarism.

messages.action_required_text: This section is nearly identical to an existing source. Rewrite or cite properly.
messages.no_data_banner: These sources were flagged as similar. Detailed word-level analysis not available for all sources.
messages.no_plagiarism_desc: Your text shows high originality. Great work!
messages.empty_desc: Paste your text above to get started

tips.title: Tips for Researchers
tips.paraphrase: Paraphrase properly and add your own analysis
tips.cite: Add proper citations for all sources
tips.quotes: Use direct quotes sparingly and mark them clearly
tips.analysis: Include your own critical analysis and interpretation

empty.feature1_desc: Check against millions of sources online
empty.feature2_desc: Get detailed plagiarism reports in seconds
empty.feature3_desc: See exactly where similar content appears

journals.title: Journal Finder
journals.description: Get personalized journal recommendations based on your research
journals.form_description: Enter your research abstract and keywords to get journal recommendations
journals.keywords_placeholder: e.g., machine learning, deep learning, AI
journals.empty_message: Enter your abstract and keywords to find suitable journals
